mapper.sql: select id, zzjg_id, end_plantime, dispatcher, dispatch_time, bz_id, task_description, publish_status, task_status, walker_id, task_endtime, task_cxtime, site_description, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time from sd_task_list
mapper.select: select t.id, s.tunnel_name,d.dept_name zzjg_id, t.end_plantime, u.nick_name dispatcher,t.dispatch_time, b.dept_name bzName,b.dept_name bz_id, t.task_description, t.publish_status, t.task_status, w.nick_name walker_id, t.task_endtime, t.task_cxtime, t.site_description, t.create_by, t.create_time, t.update_by, t.update_time,p.dict_label publish,a.dict_label task from sd_task_list t left join sys_dept d on d.dept_id = t.zzjg_id left join sys_user u on t.dispatcher = u.user_id left join sd_teams b on b.dept_id = t.bz_id left join sys_user w on t.walker_id = w.user_id left join sd_tunnels s on s.tunnel_id = t.tunnel_id left join sys_dict_data p on p.dict_value= t.publish_status and p.dict_type = 'publish_status' left join sys_dict_data a on a.dict_value= t.task_status and a.dict_type = 'task_status' where t.id = #{id}
mapper.insert:
insert into sd_task_list
id, task_name, tunnel_id, zzjg_id, end_plantime, dispatcher, dispatch_time, bz_id, task_description, publish_status, task_status, walker_id, task_endtime, task_cxtime, site_description, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time,
#{id}, #{taskName}, #{tunnelId}, #{zzjgId}, #{endPlantime}, #{dispatcher}, SYSDATE(), #{bzId}, #{taskDescription}, #{publishStatus}, #{taskStatus}, #{walkerId}, #{taskEndtime}, #{taskCxtime}, #{siteDescription}, #{createBy}, SYSDATE(), #{updateBy}, #{updateTime},
mapper.select: select e.tunnel_name sdName,s.id,s.task_name,s.tunnel_id,s.end_plantime,y.dept_name bzName,y.dept_id bz_id,s.dispatch_time, s.task_description,u.nick_name dispatcher,t.dict_label task_status,p.dict_label publish_status,s.task_endtime,s.task_cxtime,w.nick_name walker_id from sd_task_list s left join sys_user u on u.user_id = s.dispatcher left join sys_user w on w.user_id = s.walker_id left join sd_teams y on s.bz_id = y.dept_id left join sd_tunnels e on s.tunnel_id = e.tunnel_id left join sys_dict_data t on t.dict_value = s.task_status and t.dict_type = 'task_status' left join sys_dict_data p on p.dict_value = s.publish_status and p.dict_type = 'publish_status' where s.id = #{task_id}

select * from sd_teams
1=1 and status = '0'
AND (parent_id = #{deptId} OR parent_id IN ( SELECT d.dept_id FROM sys_dept d WHERE FIND_IN_SET (#{deptId},d.ancestors) ))
mapper.update: update sd_task_list set publish_status = '1' where id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select t.task_name,e.tunnel_name,d.dept_name zzjg_id,t.end_plantime,u.nick_name dispatcher,t.task_description,t.task_status,t.id from sd_task_list t left join sys_dept d on d.dept_id = t.zzjg_id left join sys_user u on t.dispatcher = u.user_id left join sd_tunnels e on t.tunnel_id = e.tunnel_id where 1=1 AND CONCAT(t.task_name, e.tunnel_name) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{params.taskName},'%') and t.task_status = #{params.taskStatus} and t.end_plantime < now() and (t.task_status in(0,1) or t.task_status = '2,4') and (t.task_status = '2,4' or t.task_status = '2') and (t.end_plantime BETWEEN #{params.startTime} and #{params.endTime})
AND (t.bz_id = #{params.deptId} OR t.bz_id IN ( SELECT q.dept_id FROM sd_teams q WHERE FIND_IN_SET (#{params.deptId},q.ancestors) ))
and publish_status ='2' order by t.create_time desc
limit #{params.pageNum},#{params.pageSize}

select t.task_name,e.tunnel_name,d.dept_name zzjg_id,t.end_plantime,u.nick_name dispatcher,t.task_description,t.task_status,t.id from sd_task_list t left join sys_dept d on d.dept_id = t.zzjg_id left join sys_user u on t.dispatcher = u.user_id left join sd_tunnels e on t.tunnel_id = e.tunnel_id where 1=1 AND CONCAT(t.task_name, e.tunnel_name) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{params.taskName},'%') and t.task_status = #{params.taskStatus} and t.end_plantime < now() and (t.task_status in(0,1) or t.task_status = '2,4') and (t.task_status = '2,4' or t.task_status = '2') and (t.end_plantime BETWEEN #{params.startTime} and #{params.endTime})
AND (t.bz_id = #{params.deptId} OR t.bz_id IN ( SELECT q.dept_id FROM sd_teams q WHERE FIND_IN_SET (#{params.deptId},q.dept_id) ))
and t.publish_status ='2' and (ISNULL(walker_id) or t.walker_id = #{params.userId}) order by t.create_time desc
limit #{params.pageNum},#{params.pageSize}
mapper.update: update sd_task_list set task_status = '1' ,walker_id = #{userId} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select p.opt_type,u.nick_name opt_person_id,p.opt_time,opt_description,e.tunnel_name from sd_task_opt p left join sys_user u on u.user_id = p.opt_person_id left join sd_task_list t on p.task_id = t.id left join sd_tunnels e on t.tunnel_id = e.tunnel_id where p.task_id = #{taskId}
select dict_label,dict_value from sys_dict_data where dict_type = 'task_status'
mapper.insert:
insert into sd_task_opt
id, task_id, opt_type, opt_person_id, opt_time, opt_description,
#{id}, #{taskId}, #{optType}, #{optPersonId}, SYSDATE(), #{optDescription},
mapper.select:
select * from sd_task_list
where bz_id = #{deptId} OR bz_id IN ( SELECT q.dept_id FROM sd_teams q WHERE FIND_IN_SET (#{deptId},q.ancestors)) and task_status in('0','1','3','4') and publish_status ='2'

select * from sd_task_list
where (bz_id = #{deptId} OR bz_id IN ( SELECT q.dept_id FROM sd_teams q WHERE FIND_IN_SET (#{deptId},q.dept_id))) and publish_status ='2' and ((task_status in('0','1','3','4') and walker_id = #{userId})or(task_status ='0' and ISNULL(walker_id)))
select manager_id from sd_tunnels where tunnel_id = #{tunnelId}
select id from sd_task_list where id like concat(#{pid}, '%') order by id desc limit 1

select count(1) from sd_task_list t left join sd_tunnels e on t.tunnel_id = e.tunnel_id left join sys_dept d on d.dept_id = t.zzjg_id left join sys_user u on t.dispatcher = u.user_id where 1=1 AND CONCAT(t.task_name, e.tunnel_name) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{taskName},'%') and t.task_status = #{taskStatus} and t.end_plantime < now() and (t.task_status in(0,1) or t.task_status = '2,4') and (t.task_status = '2,4' or t.task_status = '2') and (t.end_plantime BETWEEN #{startTime} and #{endTime})
AND (t.bz_id= #{deptId} OR t.bz_id IN ( SELECT q.dept_id FROM sd_teams q WHERE FIND_IN_SET (#{deptId},q.ancestors) ))
and publish_status ='2'

select count(1) from sd_task_list t left join sd_tunnels e on t.tunnel_id = e.tunnel_id left join sys_dept d on d.dept_id = t.zzjg_id left join sys_user u on t.dispatcher = u.user_id where 1=1 AND CONCAT(t.task_name, e.tunnel_name) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{taskName},'%') and t.task_status = #{taskStatus} and t.end_plantime < now() and (t.task_status in(0,1) or t.task_status = '2,4') and (t.task_status = '2,4' or t.task_status = '2') and (t.end_plantime BETWEEN #{startTime} and #{endTime})
AND (t.bz_id= #{deptId} OR t.bz_id IN ( SELECT q.dept_id FROM sd_teams q WHERE FIND_IN_SET (#{deptId},q.dept_id) ))
and t.publish_status ='2' and (ISNULL(walker_id) or t.walker_id = #{userId})

select stl.id,stl.finish_status,st.dept_name bz_id,su.nick_name walker_id,stl.task_endtime,stl.task_cxtime,stl.site_description,stl.task_status from sd_task_list stl left join sd_teams st on stl.bz_id = st.dept_id left join sys_user su on stl.walker_id = su.user_id where 1=1
and stl.id = #{taskId}

select count(*) from sd_task_list where 1=1
and task_name = #{taskName}
